articles.title: Pokémon Go Creator Niantic Announces NBA All-World - IGN - IGN
articles.description: Pokémon GO creator Niantic has announced an official NBA game called NBA All-World, where players will walk around the real world meeting basketball stars instead of pocket monsters or Pikmin.
